title: Advanced Material Removal Process Design
description: Advanced turning and milling processes; grinding and non-traditional processes. Thread and gear manufacturing, producibility, machinability, part and tool materials, cutting fluids, and tool life testing. Finishes and measurement of surface roughness. Process design projects. 2 lectures, 2 laboratories.
prerequisites: IME 241 or IME 330, MATE 210 and MATE 215, and CE 204
